entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
